basics.name: Angela Joy Almeron
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Aloha mai kākou! I am currently studying for B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawai’i at Manoā, and I anticipate to graduate in Spring 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Guide students throughout their academic journey.
highlights: Create and design flyers or posters to promote career opportunities to students.
Track and report student's academic progress.

work.summary: Greet the guests and ensure they feel welcome throughout their stay.
highlights: Evenly manage seating arrangements during busy hours.

awards.title: Manoā Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students that recognizes for their academic achievements at their highschool.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Dean's List distinction is awarded when students earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more, do not receive grades of NC (no credit), W (withdrawn), I (incomplete), and F (failure).

awards.title: Dean's List

awards.title: Summa Cum Laude
awards.summary: Awarded for students who earned a GPA of 3.8 or higher.
